item.title: 美联储滞后，欧洲利率开始下降
item.description: 曾经齐心协力对抗通胀的全球央行开始分散，欧洲利率制定者转为鸽派，而美国联邦储备委员会则对过早降息保持谨慎。【原文：Global central banks that moved together to battle inflation are starting to scatter, with European rate setters turning dovish while the U.S. Federal Reserve stays cautious about cutting too soon.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数增幅超过预期
item.description: 随着劳动力市场稳步放缓，上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数增幅超过预期。【原文：The number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits increased more than expected last week as the labor market steadily eases.】

item.title: 美国汽车安全机构对福特SUV召回表示担忧
item.description: 美国一家汽车安全机构周四表示，它对福特汽车因担心燃油泄漏可能导致发动机起火而召回42,000多辆SUV表示 "严重的安全担忧"。【原文：A U.S. auto safety agency said on Thursday it has "significant safety concerns" over Ford Motor's recall of more than 42,000 SUVs over concerns fuel leaks could lead to an engine fire.】

item.title: 特朗普在与石油首席执行官会晤时誓言瞄准电动汽车--报道
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周四报道，共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普在与美国顶级石油高管的一次会议上誓言要推翻拜登政府的数十项环境规则和政策，他还要求这些高管为他的总统竞选活动筹集 10 亿美元。【原文：Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump vowed to reverse dozens of the Biden administration's environmental rules and policies at a meeting with top U.S. oil executives, where he also asked them to raise $1 billion for his presidential campaign, the Washington Post reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 雀巢旗下雀巢咖啡公司到 2026 年将在巴西投资 1.96 亿美元，以满足不断增长的需求
item.description: 雀巢公司高管告诉路透社，雀巢计划到 2026 年在巴西投资 10 亿雷亚尔（1.965 亿美元），以扩大产能和雀巢咖啡产品线的户外销售，目标客户群为年轻消费者。【原文：Nestle plans to invest 1 billion reais ($196.5 million) in Brazil by 2026 to expand production capacity and out-of-home sales of its Nescafe lines, targeting younger consumers, executives told Reuters.】

item.title: 玩家消费低迷，Roblox 下调年度预订预期
item.description: Roblox 周四下调了年度预订预期，这表明在经济前景不明朗和通胀水平升高的情况下，人们正在减少在其视频游戏平台上的消费。【原文：Roblox cut its annual bookings forecast on Thursday, in a sign that people were dialing back on spending within its video-gaming platform amid an uncertain economic outlook and elevated levels of inflation.】

item.title: 报告称，受廉价产品需求推动，1-4 月美国网络零售支出增长 7
item.description: Adobe Analytics 周四发布的一份报告显示，受食品杂货和价格较低的自由支配商品需求强劲的推动，今年 1 月至 4 月美国网上零售额增长了约 7%。【原文：Online retail sales in the U.S. rose about 7% from January to April this year, an Adobe Analytics report showed on Thursday, driven by strong demand for groceries and cheaper discretionary items.】

item.title: TikTok 将为 OpenAI 等人工智能生成的图片和视频贴标签
item.description: TikTok 周四表示，它将开始使用一种技术，该技术旨在帮助它标注由人工智能生成并上传到视频共享服务的图像和视频。【原文：TikTok said on Thursday it would start using a technology aimed at helping it label images and video generated by artificial intelligence and uploaded to the video sharing service.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，激进分子安科拉有望赢得诺福克南方公司的部分董事会席位
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周四表示，激进对冲基金 Ancora Holdings 已从诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）股东那里获得足够的支持，从而赢得了该美国铁路运营商董事会的部分席位。【原文：Activist hedge fund Ancora Holdings has secured enough support from Norfolk Southern shareholders to win some seats on the U.S. railway operator's board of directors, people familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: Trulieve Cannabis 季度亏损因需求增长而收窄
item.description: 受销售额增长和需求强劲的推动，大麻公司 Trulieve Cannabis 周四公布的第一季度亏损有所收窄。【原文：Pot firm Trulieve Cannabis posted a narrower first-quarter loss on Thursday, driven by higher sales and robust demand.】

item.title: Airbnb 业绩下滑，黯淡预测引发经济放缓担忧
item.description: Airbnb 股价周四盘前暴跌超过 8%，原因是对第二季度业绩的疲软预测加剧了投资者对这家度假租赁公司增长放缓的担忧，并使其强劲的季度利润表现黯然失色。【原文：Airbnb shares tumbled more than 8% premarket on Thursday after weak forecasts for the second quarter stoked investor fears about slowing growth at the vacation rental firm and took the shine off a strong quarterly profit beat.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司季度收入不及预期
item.description: 周四，华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）第一季度营收不及华尔街预期，受累于广告市场疲软以及制片厂部门因罢工导致的延期。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery missed Wall Street estimates for first-quarter revenue on Thursday, weighed down by a weak advertising market and strike-related delays at its studio segment.】

item.title: 销售额创历史新高，布雷博第一季度营业利润上升
item.description: 意大利高级制动器制造商布雷博公司周四公布，第一季度营业利润同比增长 8.5%，收入增长至创纪录的 10 亿欧元。【原文：Italian premium brake maker Brembo posted on Thursday an 8.5% yearly increase in first-quarter operating profit as revenues grew to a record 1 billion euros in the quarter.】

item.title: 英国央行更接近于 2020 年以来的首次降息
item.description: 作者：威廉-肖姆伯格、大卫-米利肯和苏班-阿卜杜拉【原文：By William Schomberg, David Milliken and Suban Abdulla】

item.title: 由于需求疲软，Coach 母公司 Tapestry 下调了年度销售预期
item.description: 蔻驰手袋生产商 Tapestry 周四下调了全年销售预期，此前该公司第三季度营收未达预期，原因是有迹象表明，在高通胀的情况下，手袋和配饰的需求仍将疲软。【原文：Coach handbag maker Tapestry cut its annual sales forecast after missing third-quarter revenue estimates on Thursday, on signs that demand for its handbags and accessories would remain weak in the face of high inflation.】

item.title: 柴油熊市给石油带来新麻烦
item.description: 由于新的炼油厂增加了供应，北半球温和的天气和缓慢的经济活动削弱了需求，柴油的利润率正在下滑，使油价面临进一步下跌的压力。【原文：Profit margins for diesel are slumping as new refineries boost supplies and as mild weather in the northern hemisphere and slow economic activity eat into demand, putting oil prices under further downward pressure.】

item.title: 巴西电力公司第一季度净收入下降 19
item.description: 巴西电力巨头巴西国家电力公司（Eletrobras）周三晚些时候公布，由于恢复了对输电部门的投资，该公司第一季度净利润为 3.31 亿雷亚尔（合 6500 万美元），同比下降 19%。【原文：Brazilian power giant Eletrobras reported late on Wednesday a first-quarter net profit of 331 million reais ($65 million), down 19% from a year earlier as it resumed investments in the transmission segment.】

item.title: 零售交易反弹，Robinhood 业绩大涨，创下季度新高
item.description: Robinhood Markets 周四公布了创纪录的第一季度营收和利润，并在盘前交易中大涨，这主要得益于普通投资者重返其免佣金平台交易加密货币。【原文：Robinhood Markets jumped in premarket trading on Thursday after reporting record first-quarter revenue and profit thanks to mom-and-pop investors returning to its commission-free platform to trade cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，索尼集团和其他公司正考虑收购 Infocom
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，索尼集团和其他各方正在考虑收购在线漫画商店运营商 Infocom 公司，交易价值高达 2000 亿日元（约合 12.8 亿美元）。【原文：Sony Group and other parties are considering buying online comic store operator Infocom Corp in a deal worth up to 200 billion yen ($1.28 billion), Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国 中国贸易升温，英国利率可期
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 欧盟大选前夕，经济给选民带来伤痛
item.description: 在国家支持的投资推动下，法国北部的敦刻尔克港掀起了一股工业小高潮，它是埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）总统相信解决失业问题是遏制极右翼支持的最佳途径的一个展示窗口。【原文：The northern French port of Dunkirk, riding an industrial mini-boom thanks to a state-backed investment push, is a showcase for President Emmanuel Macron's belief that fighting unemployment is the best way to curb support for the far-right.】

item.title: 比尔-黄（Bill Hwang）因阿尔凯戈斯公司倒闭案受审的陪审员即将选出
item.description: 黄成国（Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang）因其价值 360 亿美元的基金 Archegos Capital Management 于 2021 年倒闭而受到敲诈勒索罪的刑事审判，预计将于周四结束陪审团的挑选工作，为下周的开庭陈述和证人证词做好准备。【原文：Jury selection is expected to wrap up Thursday in the criminal racketeering trial of Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang over the 2021 collapse of his $36 billion fund Archegos Capital Management, setting the stage for opening statements and witness testimony next week.】

item.title: 独家报道必和必拓与英美资源集团的交易引发日本钢铁业警觉
item.description: 日本钢铁制造商向澳大利亚当局表示担心，如果必和必拓集团继续收购英美资源集团（Anglo American），可能会在全球炼焦煤供应中占据过大的主导地位。【原文：Japanese steelmakers have raised concerns with Australian authorities that BHP Group could become too dominant in the global supply of coking coal if it goes ahead with a takeover of Anglo American .】

item.title: 数据显示，对联邦存款保险公司领导层的不信任促使更多员工考虑离职
item.description: 路透社获得的最新联邦存款保险公司员工调查数据显示，员工对联邦存款保险公司领导层的信任度急剧下降，远低于政府平均水平，越来越多的员工考虑离开该机构。【原文：Staff trust in the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation's leadership has fallen sharply to well below government averages, with a growing number of workers considering leaving the agency, the latest FDIC staff survey data obtained by Reuters shows.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪高管表示将考虑在 2025 年在欧洲建立第二家工厂
item.description: 中国汽车制造商比亚迪欧洲总经理迈克尔-舒（Michael Shu）周四表示，比亚迪将考虑于2025年在欧洲建立第二家组装厂。【原文：Chinese automaker BYD will consider building a second assembly plant in Europe in 2025, its European managing director Michael Shu said on Thursday.】

item.title: 聚焦：拖拉机太多随着经济繁荣时期的消逝，农用设备堆积如山
item.description: 农作物价格下降使农业设备销售商面临拖拉机和联合收割机滞销的问题。为了解决过剩问题，经销商正在对机器打折、暂停新订单，甚至降价拍卖设备。【原文：Falling crop prices are leaving agriculture equipment sellers with an excess of unsold tractors and combines. To cope with the surplus, dealers are discounting machines, suspending new orders, and even auctioning off equipment at reduced prices.】

item.title: 国债收益率上升，等待失业救济数据，期指下跌
item.description: 美国股指期货周四下滑，原因是国债收益率在申请失业救济人数数据公布前进一步上升，该数据可能会更清楚地显示美联储今年的利率议程。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Thursday as Treasury yields rose further ahead of jobless claims data that could provide a clearer picture of the Federal Reserve's interest rate agenda for the year.】

item.title: 独家报道：企业气候监督文件认为碳抵消基本无效
item.description: 路透社审阅的一份机密初稿显示，一个有影响力的企业气候行动组织的工作人员现在发现，这种抵消在很大程度上是无效的，该组织的董事会宣布了一项计划，允许企业用碳信用额抵消其供应链中的温室气体排放。【原文：Staff at an influential corporate climate action group whose board announced a plan to allow companies to offset greenhouse gas emissions from their supply chain with carbon credits has now found such offsets are largely ineffective, a confidential preliminary draft reviewed by Reuters shows.】

item.title: 美联储的沟通风格在分析师中得分很高，但在公众中得分不高
item.description: 据周四公布的一项针对学术界和私营部门分析师的调查显示，在经历了高通胀、激进加息和全球不稳定的动荡时期后，美国联邦储备委员会（美联储）在其货币政策沟通方面获得了相对较高的评价，尽管它一直在不确定性的重重困难中徘徊。【原文：Through a tumultuous period of high inflation, aggressive interest rate hikes, and global instability, the U.S. Federal Reserve received relatively high marks for its monetary policy communications despite the thicket of uncertainty it has been navigating, according to a survey of academic and private-sector analysts released on Thursday.】

item.title: 日产汽车第四季度营业利润增长 3
item.description: 日本日产汽车公司周四公布第四季度营业利润增长 3%，同时警告称，预计本财年将继续面临激烈的竞争和通胀压力。【原文：Japan's Nissan Motor posted a 3% rise in fourth-quarter operating profit on Thursday while warning that it expects to keep facing intense competition and inflationary pressure this financial year.】
